no_selection_message: Please select a profile to edit.

The mod '{display_name}' will be replaced with the file '{file_name}'.

msg_patool_required: 'patool' and 'py7zr' are required for this function.

tray_running_message: MIMM is still active in the background.

The following libraries are missing: {deps}.

info_support_message: Support my work to help me continue providing updates and new features!
